name: Lalbaagh Fort
desc: Lalbagh Fort is an incomplete 17th-century Mughal fort complex

name: Ahsan Manzil Museum
desc: Ahsan Manzil used to be the official residential palace and seat of the Nawab of Dhaka.

name: Bangladesh National Parliament
desc: Jatiya Sangsad Bhaban or National Parliament House, is the house of the Parliament of Bangladesh,

name: Central Shaheed Minar
desc: The Shaheed Minar is a national monument in Dhaka

name: Baitul Mukarram National Mosque
desc: Baitul Mukarram, also spelled as Baytul Mukarrom is the National Mosque of Bangladesh

name: Curzon Hall
desc: The Curzon Hall is a British Raj-era building and home of the Faculty of Sciences at the University of Dhaka.
